Articles.Content:
I was using Kerbal engineer (in 0.24, not 0.25), with a 0.378 ton probe equpped with 1 ion drive.

For Duna, it showed a TWR of 1.80, which is what I would calculate from the wiki gravity value of 2.94 m/s

Yet for Moho, it showed a TWR of 1.35 -> which is lower than that of Duna, while the wiki shows that Duna has the higher gravity.

I didn't have time today to go to one of my saves with a moho mission already en route, and measure the surface gravity on my own.

I have a feeling that KER would read the actual game data, and may be more accurate than the wiki.

Can anyone tell me why KER showed a lower TWR for my craft at Moho than at Duna?

Is the wiki accurate?

Does KER have a problem?

Is it fixed in t he 0.25 version?
Just tried in 0.25 with KER 1.0.10, seems to be working correctly, i.e. lower TWR calculated for Duna than for Moho.
